reviewText: Beautifully adapted to Lorca's original. Beautifully acted and photographed
Maybe I got this one wrong, I was expecting the Spanish version, the Moroccan one is just not the same. It is a shame that due to global zones for DVD I cannot get the Spanish versions.

this adaptation has many qualities, but the most importante is Irene Papas in the cast. AS Always she brings high level beeing one of the most importante dramatic actress of all times Ans there is Lorca... what else we need?

While I certainly did not expect to purchase a Hollywood blockbuster... this DVD fell far beneath my hopes.  While it may help my students to understand Lorca's work better, I will only show it if I have extra time.
